subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] For David, David  Roundtree Re: Chris Moon and more David
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Hey David, Don't give up, yet.=A0 I just got back to read all the posts, m=
ostly dedicated to you.=A0 I actually had written a few responses after my =
first one to you but was not a able to complete my thoughts so it went onto=
 "draft."=A0 
=A0
I did take time to look at you web site and I am impresse=
d.=A0 You obviously have excellent scientific/engineering credentials to wa=
rrant saying "I want you on my side."=A0 If some of the messages we are rec=
eiving are from other than traditional EVP sources, I want to know about th=
em.=A0 Alien, hoaxer, CIA, MIB,=A0Anunnaki, or whatever.=A0=A0As well, it w=
ould be great to know about=A0frequencies, QM,=A0electromagnetic readings, =
everything and anything that=A0you=A0could add to the data would be terrifi=
c...at some point in time.=A0=A0But, using Remote viewing as an example, wh=
ich you investigated and discussed on your web sit, don't you think the "ap=
plication" of this phenomena (I won't yet elevate it to the term "technolog=
y") is worth=A0serious investigation.=A0=A0Remote viewing was developed=A0d=
ue to the results it got.=A0 It never was, and still has not been investiga=
ted and accepted by the "scientific community."=A0 In other words it has no=
t been subjected=A0standards
 of proof.=A0 Yet it works.=A0 I know this bec=
ause I have proved it to myself.=A0 I know EVP works=A0because I have prove=
d it to myself.
=A0
So, my question is from, let's call it, a "marketing ap=
proach."=A0 That is my back group, when I was in the world of making money =
for a living.=A0=A0=A0My questioning process went something like this:=A0=
=A01) what=A0does it do=A0=A0 2) what benefit does=A0it have to me and othe=
rs=A0=A0=A03) what can I do with it.=A0=A0=A0With this approach we develope=
d cable TV and satellite services....I was selling cable tv and 24 hour new=
s channels when people were asking "why in the world would you need more th=
an=A0three channels ---=A0 abc, nbc and cbs?=A0=A0=A0And,=A0who in the worl=
d would want a 24 hour news channel?=A0 Then I was involved in selling=A0ca=
r navigation systems in the 80's=A0and=A0portable cell phones that weighed =
and were shaped like a brick and sold for $5,000.=A0 What's that got to do =
with EVP-ITC?=A0 It has to do with the people involved EVP-ITC...we are at =
the forefront.=A0=A0 Some of us have touched the other side and know what i=
s there.=A0 We do not need to prove it exists
 to anyone else...although ac=
knowledgment from others at times would be nice and certainly appreciated.=
=A0
=A0
In my first email to you I suggested that you get a radio shack hac=
k and go talk to it.=A0 Maybe you have=A0already=A0done a zillion hours wit=
h one, but I am not aware of any posts you have done.=A0 =A0If possible can=
 you direct me to where I can listen to your actual=A0recordings?=A0 I did =
not find them here or on your web site.=A0 Also, I have a few=A0EVP message=
s of my own that I would=A0really like you to hear and analyze in any way y=
ou can and I will send them to you.=A0 Let's do this in private emails, if =
you will.=A0 
=A0
And finally, let me=A0just add to the application aspect =
of this work.=A0 I=A0know of a number of EVPers who have been working with =
law=A0enforcement to help with missing persons and murder cases.=A0 If you =
have not visited Sandra=A0Belanger's web site at=A0www.heliumraven.com I wo=
uld encourage you to do so and let me know your thoughts.=A0=A0 I would als=
o like to learn how we=A0can get information from the other side to help wi=
th medical problems like autism in children and to help solve our energy is=
sues.=A0 If we get answers that are usable from the other side in law enfor=
cement, to learn about relatives who have passed on, or to solve medical or=
=A0other real world problems, does it really=A0matter where=A0or how the me=
ssages got here?=A0=A0 I is where the value is in this and other groups who=
 do not use the scientific method.=A0 I can't speak for everyone here but I=
 think we should welcome someone like you to work with us.=A0 keep=A0up the=
 good work=A0=A0 ron l=A0=A0=A0

--- On Tue, 11/11/08, David Rountree <ghos=
t_hunter_01@...> wrote:

From: David Rountree <ghost_hunter_01@comc=
ast.net>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Chris Moon and his use of Franks Box gets s=
lammed
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, November 11, 2008, 11:40 =
AM






And making a bomb from an atom was ludicrous.

The "idiot" with th=
e degree is a physicist who has a wealth of work 
that has nothing to do wi=
th ITC or the paranormal. Statements like 
this appear to others as based o=
n ignorance and reflects poorly only 
on the person who says it, indicating=
 a lack of undersdtanding and 
tolerance for anything counter to their agen=
da.

If you make outstanding claims to the world, and can not back them up =

with data to demonstrate your claims, you will get scrutinized.

It will a=
lso feed your critics.

Lets add in common sense. IF you really are communi=
cating with the 
dead, (and this would be huge) why isn't on the front page=
 of every 
news paper in the world?

Because it lacks what some of you don'=
t understand what I do. Build a 
case to confirm or debunk these claims.

I=
 guess me question boils down to this; is this a group for objective 
discu=
ssion of ITC-EVP potential, or a fan club for Frank Sumption?

Dr. Rorke is=
 a friend of mine. I haven't attacked anyone in here 
because of their opin=
ions, I have offered things I have learned over 
the years (since 1976). I =
am also one of those "idiots" with a 
degree, and it has made me quite a go=
od living designing large scale 
audio systems and information distribution=
s systems. There is no 
mystery in any of the electronic circuits used in I=
TC technology to 
me.

I don't understand why if someone finds evidence tha=
t a duck is a 
duck, why people insist on calling it a bull. Research is ab=
out 
discovering the answer, even if it isn't the answer you expect or are =

looking for. Granted, I totally understand if eople dissagree with 
someon=
e's findings, and to discredit it would require supporting 
data, not opini=
on. Too much of this field is filled with opinions 
instead of data.

I wis=
h you all well and good luck with your experiments. I believed I 
have join=
ed the wrong discussion group. To those who have e-mailed be 
I have enjoye=
d our conversations.

born.

an

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV id=yiv1855538974>
<DIV>Hey David, Don't give up, yet.  I just got back to read all the posts, mostly dedicated to you.  I actually had written a few responses after my first one to you but was not a able to complete my thoughts so it went onto "draft."  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I did take time to look at you web site and I am impressed.  You obviously have excellent scientific/engineering credentials to warrant saying "I want you on my side."  If some of the messages we are receiving are from other than traditional EVP sources, I want to know about them.  Alien, hoaxer, CIA, MIB, Anunnaki, or whatever.  As well, it would be great to know about frequencies, QM, electromagnetic readings, everything and anything that you could add to the data would be terrific...at some point in time.  But, using Remote viewing as an example, which you investigated and discussed on your web sit, don't you think the "application" of this phenomena (I won't yet elevate it to the term "technology") is worth serious investigation.  Remote viewing was developed due to the results it got.  It never was, and still has not been investigated and accepted by the
 "scientific community."  In other words it has not been subjected standards of proof.  Yet it works.  I know this because I have proved it to myself.  I know EVP works because I have proved it to myself.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>So, my question is from, let's call it, a "marketing approach."  That is my back group, when I was in the world of making money for a living.   My questioning process went something like this:  1) what does it do   2) what benefit does it have to me and others   3) what can I do with it.   With this approach we developed cable TV and satellite services....I was selling cable tv and 24 hour news channels when people were asking "why in the world would you need more than three channels ---  abc, nbc and cbs?   And, who in the world would want a 24 hour news channel?  Then I was involved in selling car navigation systems in the 80's and portable cell phones that weighed and were shaped like a brick and sold for $5,000.  What's that got to do with EVP-ITC?  It has to do with the people involved EVP-ITC...we are at
 the forefront.   Some of us have touched the other side and know what is there.  We do not need to prove it exists to anyone else...although acknowledgment from others at times would be nice and certainly appreciated. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>In my first email to you I suggested that you get a radio shack hack and go talk to it.  Maybe you have already done a zillion hours with one, but I am not aware of any posts you have done.   If possible can you direct me to where I can listen to your actual recordings?  I did not find them here or on your web site.  Also, I have a few EVP messages of my own that I would really like you to hear and analyze in any way you can and I will send them to you.  Let's do this in private emails, if you will.  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>And finally, let me just add to the application aspect of this work.  I know of a number of EVPers who have been working with law enforcement to help with missing persons and murder cases.  If you have not visited Sandra Belanger's web site at <A href="http://www.heliumraven.com">www.heliumraven.com</A> I would encourage you to do so and let me know your thoughts.   I would also like to learn how we can get information from the other side to help with medical problems like autism in children and to help solve our energy issues.  If we get answers that are usable from the other side in law enforcement, to learn about relatives who have passed on, or to solve medical or other real world problems, does it really matter where or how the messages got here?   I is where the value is in this and other groups who do not use the scientific method.  I can't speak for everyone
 here but I think we should welcome someone like you to work with us.  keep up the good work   ron l   <BR><BR>--- On <B>Tue, 11/11/08, David <SPAN>Rountree</SPAN> <I><ghost_hunter_01@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>

<DIV>And making a bomb from an atom was ludicrous.<BR><BR>The "idiot" with the degree is a physicist who has a wealth of work <BR>that has nothing to do with ITC or the paranormal. Statements like <BR>this appear to others as based on ignorance and reflects poorly only <BR>on the person who says it, indicating a lack of undersdtanding and <BR>tolerance for anything counter to their agenda.<BR><BR>If you make outstanding claims to the world, and can not back them up <BR>with data to demonstrate your claims, you will get scrutinized.<BR><BR>It will also feed your critics.<BR><BR>Lets add in common sense. IF you really are communicating with the <BR>dead, (and this would be huge) why isn't on the front page of every <BR>news paper in the world?<BR><BR>Because it lacks what some of you don't understand what I do.  ITC-EVP potential, or a fan club for Frank Sumption?<BR><BR>Dr. Rorke is a friend of mine.
